Title: Relates to establishing the tenancy deposit protection program
Summary: Relates to establishing the tenancy deposit protection program; requires the commissioner of housing and community renewal to establish a program to hold security deposits in third-party accounts and create a dispute resolution process regarding the withholding of security deposits.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, Pub Hous L; amd ยง7-103, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the general obligations law, in relation to establishing the tenancy deposit protection program
